actions.name: A010
actions.description: Load weight target from Unit parameter (If solution prep)
actions.expression:
IF	('//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT' = ""055MSS1500"" OR '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT' = ""055MSS2200"" OR
	 '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT' = ""055MSS2300"" OR '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT' = ""055MSS2500"")
THEN
	IF	'^/R_WGT.CV' = 0
	THEN
		'^/R_WGT.CV' := '//#THISUNIT#/U_PRMPT_FTP.CV'
	ENDIF;
ELSE
	'//#THISUNIT#/U_PRMPT_FTP.CV' := 0
ENDIF;

actions.name: A010
EXIT
actions.description: Clear Message After A010 is Complete

actions.name: A020
actions.description: Reset Hold Request for AGIT_EM (Agitator EM)
actions.confirmExpression:
((( '//#AGIT_EM#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')  OR 
( '//#AGIT_EM#/OWNER_ID.CV' = ""(None)"" )) AND
('//#AGIT_EM#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE)) OR
('/AGIT_EM.IGN' = TRUE) OR 
('//#AGIT_EM#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')

actions.name: A030
actions.description: Reset Hold Request for PUMP_RCV (Pump Receive)
actions.confirmExpression:
((( '//#PUMP_RCV#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')  OR 
( '//#PUMP_RCV#/OWNER_ID.CV' = ""(None)"" )) AND
('//#PUMP_RCV#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE)) OR
('/PUMP_RCV.IGN' = TRUE) OR 
('//#PUMP_RCV#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')

actions.name: EXIT
actions.description: Set Phase Held Flag to False

actions.name: A040
actions.description: Enable SM03 (Transfer Pump) If Pump is required

actions.name: A050
actions.confirmExpression:
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' = TRUE AND 
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' = TRUE AND 
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' = TRUE AND 
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' = TRUE AND 
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' = TRUE AND
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' = TRUE

actions.name: A020
actions.description: Restart Agitator if Agitation Required and Task Pointer >= 4 and < 99 after A010
actions.confirmExpression:
('^/R_AGIT_CTRL_REQ.CV' = '_YES_NO:YES' AND '^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' >= 4 AND '//#AGIT_EM#/A_PV.CV' = 'S_EM_AGIT_CTRL:Weight Control') OR
('/AGIT_EM.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' < 4) OR ('^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' >= 99) OR ('^/R_AGIT_CTRL_REQ.CV' = '_YES_NO:NO')

actions.name: A020
actions.description: Set ready to acquire transfer panel flag (if transfer panel is used)
actions.expression:
IF	'^/R_DWNSTRM_UNIT.CV' = 'S-SUM-UNITS:055TPS101'
	THEN	
	'//#THISUNIT#/OP002_VALUE.CV' := TRUE
	ELSE
	'//#THISUNIT#/OP002_VALUE.CV' := FALSE
ENDIF;

actions.name: A035
actions.description: Set PUMP_XFR (Peristaltic Pump Control Block) Setpoint to R_PUMP_INT_SP (Pump Initial Speed Setpoint (RPM))
actions.expression:
IF
	('/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS1500"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2200"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2300"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2500"")
THEN
	'//#PUMP_XFR#/SP' := '^/R_PUMP_INT_SP.CV' 	(* Start Pump at Mimimum Speed *)
ELSE
	'//#PUMP_XFR#/SP' := '^/R_PUMP_SP.CV'	(* Start Pump at Formula Speed *)
ENDIF

actions.expression:
IF '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS1500"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2200"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2300"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS2500"" OR '/THISUNIT.CV' = ""055MSS3800"" THEN

actions.confirmExpression:
(('^/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE) AND 
 (('^/AGIT/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE) OR ('^/AGIT/OWNER_ID.CV' != '^/MY_TAG.CV') OR ('^/AGIT/_IGNORE.CV' = TRUE)) AND 
 (('^/WI_MT_WGT/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE) OR ('^/WI_MT_WGT/OWNER_ID.CV' != '^/MY_TAG.CV') OR ('^/WI_MT_WGT/_IGNORE.CV' = TRUE)) AND 
  (('^/WI_MI_WGT/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE) OR ('^/WI_MI_WGT/OWNER_ID.CV' != '^/MY_TAG.CV') OR ('^/WI_MI_WGT/_IGNORE.CV' = TRUE))) OR 
 ('H0010/TIME.CV' >= ('^/TIME_SAVE.CV' + '^/HOLD_TMOUT.CV'));

(('^/AGIT/HOLD_REQ.CV' = FALSE) OR ('^/AGIT/OWNER_ID.CV' != '^/MY_TAG.CV') OR ('^/AGIT/_IGNORE.CV' = TRUE))

actions.name: A0010
actions.confirmExpression:
('TARE.CV' = FALSE) AND 
('RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = FALSE) AND 
('ZERO.CV' = FALSE) AND 
('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = FALSE)

actions.name: A0020
actions.description: Execute Tare command if TARE command parameter is True
actions.confirmExpression:
('TARE.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('TARE.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Set Tare') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = TRUE)) OR
(('TARE.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0030
actions.description: Execute Clear command if Reset Power Fail command parameter is True
actions.confirmExpression:
('RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Reset Power Fail Bit') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/POWER_FAIL.CV' = FALSE)) OR
(('RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 (('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) OR ('^/POWER_FAIL.CV' = TRUE)) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0040
actions.description: Execute zero command if ZERO command parameter is True
actions.confirmExpression:
('ZERO.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('ZERO.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Set Zero') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = TRUE)) OR
(('ZERO.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0050
actions.description: Execute Cancel Tare command if CANCEL TARE command parameter is True
actions.confirmExpression:
('CANCEL_TARE.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('CANCEL_TARE.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Cancel Tare') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = TRUE)) OR
(('CANCEL_TARE.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.description: Execute clear Request and commands if SET_TARE_WGT is True

actions.name: A0070
actions.description: Execute Set Tare Weight command if SET_TARE_WGT command parameter is True
actions.confirmExpression:
('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Cancel Tare') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = TRUE)) OR
(('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0080
actions.description: Execute clear Request and commands if SET_TARE_WGT is True

actions.name: A0090
actions.description: Execute Fix Tare command if SET_TARE_WGT command parameter is True

('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = FALSE) OR

 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND
 ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_SCALE_COMMANDS:Fix Tare') AND 
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = False) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = TRUE)) OR
(('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/SCALE_COMMAND.CV' = (('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' * 16777216) + ('^/WR_ACTION_TYPE.CV' * 65536))) AND
 ('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0100
actions.description: Execute Set Tare Weight command if SET_TARE_WGT command parameter is True

('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = FALSE) OR
(('SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
 ('^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV' = 'S_COMBIC2_DATA_REQUEST:No Function') AND

('^/DINT_INPUT_IND.CV' = '^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV') AND
('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND
('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = FALSE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))OR
(('WT_READ_TYPE_TAR.CV' = 'S_COMBICS_READ_TYPE_REQUEST:Gross Weight') AND
('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

actions.name: A0040
actions.description: Set Scale read value to Net Weight

('WT_READ_TYPE_TAR.CV' != 'S_COMBICS_READ_TYPE_REQUEST:Net Weight') OR 
(('WT_READ_TYPE_TAR.CV' = 'S_COMBICS_READ_TYPE_REQUEST:Net Weight') AND
('^/DINT_INPUT_IND.CV' = '^/WR_REQ_TYPE.CV') AND
('^/COMMAND_ACTIVE.CV' = FALSE) AND

actions.name: A0050
actions.description: Set Scale read value to Tare Weight
actions.confirmExpression:
('WT_READ_TYPE_TAR.CV' != 'S_COMBICS_READ_TYPE_REQUEST:Tare Weight') OR 
(('WT_READ_TYPE_TAR.CV' = 'S_COMBICS_READ_TYPE_REQUEST:Tare Weight') AND

actions.name: A010
A020
actions.description: Set EM_AGIT (Agitation Control EM) to Restart Command
actions.expression:
IF	('^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' != 3) AND ('//#EM_AGIT#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')
	THEN
	IF	('//#EM_AGIT#/A_PV.CV' != '^/P_RSTRT_EM_AGIT.CV')
		THEN
		'//#EM_AGIT#/A_COMMAND.CV' := '^/P_RSTRT_EM_AGIT.CV'
	ENDIF;
ENDIF;
actions.confirmExpression:
('^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' = 3) OR
('//#EM_AGIT#/A_PV.CV' = '^/P_RSTRT_EM_AGIT.CV') OR
('^/P_RSTRT_EM_AGIT.CV' = 'S_2K_EM_OFF_AUTO:AUTO' AND '//#BAG_WGT#/NET_WGT.CV' < '//#THISUNIT#/UP028_VALUE.CV' AND '//#EM_AGIT#/A_TARGET.CV' = 'S_2K_EM_OFF_AUTO:AUTO') OR
('//#EM_AGIT#/A_PV.CV' = 'S_2K_EM_OFF_AUTO:AUTO') OR
('/EM_AGIT.IGN' = TRUE)

actions.name: A030
actions.description: Set EM_TEMP (Temperature Control EM) to Restart Command
actions.expression:
IF	('^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' != 4 AND '^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' != 11) AND ('//#EM_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')
	THEN
	IF	('//#EM_TEMP#/A_PV.CV' != '^/P_RSTRT_EM_TEMP.CV')
		THEN
		'//#EM_TEMP#/A_COMMAND.CV' := '^/P_RSTRT_EM_TEMP.CV'
	ENDIF;
ENDIF;

actions.name: A020
actions.expression:
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_01.CV' := TRUE;	(* Agitation Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_02.CV' := TRUE;	(* Temperature Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_03.CV' := TRUE;	(* Addition Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_04.CV' := TRUE;	(* Air Ovelary Flow EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_05.CV' := TRUE;	(* Air Sparge Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_06.CV' := TRUE;	(* O2 Sparge Flow EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_07.CV' := TRUE;	(* DO Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_08.CV' := TRUE;	(* pCO2 Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_09.CV' := TRUE;	(* Exhaust Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_10.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_11.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_12.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_13.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_14.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_15.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* Not Used *)

actions.name: A030
actions.expression:
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := TRUE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Media Transfer is in Hold or Solution Prep. Comm. is Bad *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* No Change in Weight Failure *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := TRUE;	(* Jacket Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := '^/P_TASK_PTR.CV' <= 1 ? FALSE : TRUE;			(* High High Bag Pressure *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := TRUE;	(* Agitator Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := TRUE;	(* Jacket Loop Circulation Pump Overload *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := TRUE;	(* Jacket Heater High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := TRUE;	(* Filter Heater F600 or F610 High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := TRUE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_15.CV' := FALSE;	(* Harvest Weight Transfer is in Hold or Centrifuge Not Ready *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* CCA System Not OK or O2 System Not OK *)

ENDIF

'^/P_MSG2.CV' := ""Sending tare command to weight interface"";
'//#BAG_WGT#/TP04' := 1
ENDIF

'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_08.CV' := TRUE;	(* pCO2 Control EM *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/SM_09.CV' := TRUE;	(* Exhaust Control EM *)

actions.expression:

'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := TRUE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Media Transfer is in Hold or Solution Prep. Comm. is Bad *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* No Change in Weight Failure *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* Bag Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Bag Pressure High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* Agitator Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Loop Circulation Pump Overload *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Heater High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := TRUE;	(* Filter Heater F600 or F610 High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := TRUE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)

'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* No Change in Weight Failure *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* Bag Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Temperature High-High or Low-Low *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Bag Pressure High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* Agitator Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Loop Circulation Pump Overload *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := FALSE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Jacket Heater High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater F600 or F610 High Temperature *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := FALSE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)

actions.name: A050
actions.expression:
'^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' := '^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' + 1;
'^/P_MSG1.CV' := ""Enable Hold Monitors"";
'^/P_MSG2.CV' := """";
'^/P_MSG_TYPE1.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Required Hold Monitors
=====================================================================================
*)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := FALSE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* 055FER370/375 Bioreactor in Hold / Alarm *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Overlay Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* O2 Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* DO Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := FALSE;	(* Temperature Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := FALSE;	(* Transfer Pump Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Primary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_15.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Secondary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
(*
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Start Inline Wait -- Ensures HM are Evaluated Prior to 
Proceeding
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*)
'^/P_TIME_SAVE.CV' := 'S0020/TIME.CV';
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

 ('/EM_TEMP.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_XFR_PMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_XFR_PMP#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_XFR_PMP.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_XFR_PMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_AIR_OVRLY.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_AIR_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_O2_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_DO#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_DO.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_FLT_HTR.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')

actions.name: A010
actions.expression:
'^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' := '^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' + 1;
'^/P_MSG1.CV' := ""Enable Hold Monitors"";
'^/P_MSG2.CV' := """";
'^/P_MSG_TYPE1.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Required Hold Monitors
=====================================================================================
*)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := FALSE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* 055FER370/375 Bioreactor in Hold / Alarm *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Overlay Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* O2 Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* DO Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := FALSE;	(* Temperature Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := FALSE;	(* Transfer Pump Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Primary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_15.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Secondary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
(*
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Start Inline Wait -- Ensures HM are Evaluated Prior to 
Proceeding
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*)
'^/P_TIME_SAVE.CV' := 'S0020/TIME.CV';
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

actions.name: A010
actions.description: If Acquired, Enable Hold Request for EMs
actions.confirmExpression:
(( '//#EM_STIRRER#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_STIRRER#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_STIRRER.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_STIRRER#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_TEMP#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_TEMP.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_XFR_PMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_XFR_PMP#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_XFR_PMP.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_XFR_PMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_AIR_OVRLY.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_AIR_OVRLY#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_AIR_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_O2_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_DO#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_DO.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_FLT_HTR.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')

actions.name: A010
actions.expression:
'^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' := '^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' + 1;
'^/P_MSG1.CV' := ""Enable Hold Monitors"";
'^/P_MSG2.CV' := """";
'^/P_MSG_TYPE1.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Required Hold Monitors
=====================================================================================
*)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := FALSE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* 055FER370/375 Bioreactor in Hold / Alarm *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Overlay Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* O2 Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* DO Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := FALSE;	(* Temperature Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := FALSE;	(* Transfer Pump Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Primary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_15.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Secondary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
(*
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Start Inline Wait -- Ensures HM are Evaluated Prior to 
Proceeding
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*)
'^/P_TIME_SAVE.CV' := 'S0020/TIME.CV';
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

 ('/EM_AIR_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_AIR_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_O2_SPRG.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_O2_SPRG#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_DO#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_DO.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND
(( '//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' = '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') AND ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/HOLD_REQ.CV' = TRUE)) OR 
 ('/EM_FLT_HTR.IGN' = TRUE) OR ('//#EM_FLT_HTR#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV')

actions.name: A010
actions.expression:
'^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' := '^/P_ACT_IDX.CV' + 1;
'^/P_MSG1.CV' := ""Enable Hold Monitors"";
'^/P_MSG2.CV' := """";
'^/P_MSG_TYPE1.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Required Hold Monitors
=====================================================================================
*)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_01.CV' := FALSE;	(* Equipment Modules Ownership lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_02.CV' := FALSE;	(* Inoculation Transfer is in Hold *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_03.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Servo Drive Fault *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_04.CV' := TRUE;	(* Bag Weight High High *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_05.CV' := FALSE;	(* Combined Overlay and Sparge Gas Flow exceeded *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_06.CV' := FALSE;	(* 055FER370/375 Bioreactor in Hold / Alarm *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_07.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Overlay Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_08.CV' := FALSE;	(* Air Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_09.CV' := FALSE;	(* O2 Sparge Flow Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_10.CV' := FALSE;	(* DO Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_11.CV' := FALSE;	(* Temperature Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_12.CV' := FALSE;	(* Stirrer Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_13.CV' := FALSE;	(* Transfer Pump Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_14.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Primary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_15.CV' := FALSE;	(* Filter Heater Secondary Control remote status lost *)
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/HM_16.CV' := TRUE;	(* Emergency Stop Active *)
(*
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Start Inline Wait -- Ensures HM are Evaluated Prior to 
Proceeding
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*)
'^/P_TIME_SAVE.CV' := 'S0020/TIME.CV';
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

actions.name: A010
actions.description: Message: Sending setpoint for Volumetric Transfer

actions.name: A020
actions.expression:
IF	'^/OP004_VALUE.CV'  =  0	(* Bolus *) THEN
	IF '^/OP001_VALUE.CV' <= '^/TP001_VALUE.CV' THEN
		'^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' := '^/TP001_VALUE.CV'
	ELSE
		'^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' := '^/OP001_VALUE.CV';	(* Amount SP *)
	ENDIF;
ELSE
	IF	'^/OP003_VALUE.CV'  =  0 THEN
		'^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' := '^/TP002_VALUE.CV';	(* Feed Method and Continuous - Set Maximum Transfer Amount *)
	ELSE
		'^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' := '^/TP001_VALUE.CV';	(* Harvest Method and Continuous - Set Vessel Empty Limit *)
	ENDIF;
ENDIF;
'^/XFR_SPD_SP.CV' := '^/OP002_VALUE.CV';
'^/XFR_METHOD.CV' := '^/OP003_VALUE.CV';
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)
actions.confirmExpression:
(('^/OP004_VALUE.CV'  =  0 AND '^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' = '^/OP001_VALUE.CV') OR
 ('^/OP004_VALUE.CV'  =  0 AND '^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' = '^/TP001_VALUE.CV') OR
 ('^/OP004_VALUE.CV'  =  1 AND '^/OP003_VALUE.CV' =  0 AND '^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' = '^/TP002_VALUE.CV') OR
 ('^/OP004_VALUE.CV'  =  1 AND '^/OP003_VALUE.CV' =  1 AND '^/XFR_AMT_SP.CV' = '^/TP001_VALUE.CV')) AND
'^/XFR_SPD_SP.CV' = '^/OP002_VALUE.CV' AND
'^/XFR_METHOD.CV' = '^/OP003_VALUE.CV'

actions.expression:
IF	'CMD_CMPLT.CV' = FALSE
	THEN
	'^/MSG1.CV' := ""Command "" + '^/TARE_WGT_METH.CVS';
	'^/MSG2.CV' := ""Function was not complete"";
	'^/MSG_TYPE.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
	'TARE_HMI_VIS.CV' := TRUE
ELSE
	IF	'^/TARE_WGT_METH.CV' = 'S_SUB_TARE:UNTARE'
		THEN
		'TARE_HMI_VIS.CV' := FALSE
		ELSE
		'TARE_HMI_VIS.CV' := TRUE
	ENDIF
ENDIF;
'TARE_IP.CV' := FALSE;
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

actions.name: A010
actions.description: Display Message and Clear Task Pointer and First Pass Flag
actions.confirmExpression:
(('//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#ROCKER_SPEED#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#ROCKER_SPEED#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#BAG_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#BAG_TEMP#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#BAG_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#BAG_DO#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#O2_SPRG_FLW#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#O2_SPRG_FLW#/TP01.CV' = False) AND
('//#XFER_PUMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV' OR '//#XFER_PUMP#/TP01.CV' = False)) OR 
('A0010/TIME.CV' >= ('^/P_TIME_SAVE.CV' + '^/P_HOLD_TMOUT.CV'))

actions.name: A010
actions.description: Display Messages, Release Shared and Non-Shared Devices
actions.confirmExpression:
((('//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/ROCKER_ANGLE.IGN' = TRUE)) AND 
(('//#ROCKER_SPEED#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/ROCKER_SPEED.IGN' = TRUE)) AND 
(('//#BAG_TEMP#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/BAG_TEMP.IGN' = TRUE)) AND 
(('//#BAG_DO#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/BAG_DO.IGN' = TRUE)) AND 
(('//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/AIR_OVRLY_FLW.IGN' = TRUE)) AND 
(('//#O2_SPRG_FLW#/OWNER_ID.CV' != '//#THISUNIT#/THISUNIT.CV') OR ('/O2_SPRG_FLW.IGN' = TRUE)) AND

actions.description: Report the Step Number (RPT_STEP_NUM) and Step Description (RPT_STEP_DESC) and rest the TMR1

actions.name: A040
A060
actions.description: Display Message, prompt operator to initialize probes

actions.name: A070
actions.description: Start Equilibration Timer and wait for Equilibration Timer  Min Equilibration Time CP

actions.name: A080
actions.description: Display Message and Enable Process Low Alarms
actions.expression:
IF
     ('S0200/A070/STATE.CV' = '$sfc_action_states:Active')
THEN
    '^/P_MSG2.CV' := ""Stabilization Equilibration Timer "" + 
                     ROUND('^/R_MIN_EQUIL_TIME.CV') + "" minutes until minimum stabilization time is complete.  Elapsed Timer time: "" + '//#UNIT_SUPPORT#/TMR1/HH_MM_SS.CV';
    '^/P_MSG_TYPE1.CV' := '_MSG_TYPE:INFO';
ENDIF;
IF 
	('S0200/A070/STATE.CV' = '$sfc_action_states:Complete') 
THEN
	'^/P_MSG1.CV' := ""Minuimum Equilibration time reached. Elapsed Timer time: "" + '//#UNIT_SUPPORT#/TMR1/HH_MM_SS.CV';
ENDIF;
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Temperature process LO alarm
=====================================================================================
*)
IF ('//#BAG_TEMP#/PV.CV' > '//#BAG_TEMP#/LO_LIM.CV' + 0.05 AND '//#BAG_TEMP#/LO_ALM.ENAB' = False)
THEN
	'//#BAG_TEMP#/LO_ALM.ENAB' := True; 
ENDIF;
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Air Flow process LO alarm
=====================================================================================
*)
IF ('//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/PV.CV' > '//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/LO_LIM.CV')  AND '//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/LO_ALM.ENAB' = False
THEN
	'//#AIR_OVRLY_FLW#/LO_ALM.ENAB' := True; 
ENDIF;
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Rocking Angle process LO alarm
=====================================================================================
*)
IF ('//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/PV.CV' > '//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/LO_LIM.CV')  AND ('//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/LO_ALM.ENAB' = False) AND ('//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/TP01.CV' = True)
THEN
	'//#ROCKER_ANGLE#/LO_ALM.ENAB' := True; 
ENDIF;
(*
=====================================================================================
Enable Pressure process LO alarm
=====================================================================================
*)
IF ('//#BAG_PRESS#/PV.CV' > '//#BAG_PRESS#/LO_LIM.CV') AND '//#BAG_PRESS#/LO_ALM.ENAB' = False
THEN
	'//#BAG_PRESS#/LO_ALM.ENAB' := True; 
ENDIF;
(*
=====================================================================================
End of Code
=====================================================================================
*)

transitions.name: T0010
transitions.description: First Pass = False and Task Pointer != 99

transitions.description: First Pass = True and Task Pointer != 99

transitions.description: Operator Response of Entering New Entry

transitions.name: T0110B
transitions.description: Step Complete and R_ALLOW_NEG_RESP is False and Operator Response is Negative

transitions.name: T0130
transitions.description: Step Complete OAR Type is INT with Limits or FP with Limits and Operator Entry outside Limit
transitions.expression:
('S0120/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0) AND
(('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:INT - with Limits' OR
'^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:FP - with Limits') AND
('^/FAIL_MONITOR/OAR/INPUT.CV' > '^/R_HI_LIMIT.CV' OR
'^/FAIL_MONITOR/OAR/INPUT.CV' < '^/R_LO_LIMIT.CV'))

transitions.name: T0140
transitions.description: Step Complete and OAR Type is YesNo

transitions.name: T0150
transitions.description: Step Complete and Operator Response Positive OR Operator response is Negative and R_ALLOW_NEG_RESP is True

transitions.name: T0150A
transitions.description: Operator Response of Accepting the Entry

transitions.name: T0150C
transitions.description: Step Complete and OAR Type is OK Input or String or FP - No Limits or INT - No Limits
transitions.expression:
('S0120/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0) AND
('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:OK Input') OR
('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:String') OR
('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:FP - No Limits') OR
('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:INT- No Limits')

transitions.name: T0150D
transitions.description: Step Complete and OAR Type is INT with Limits or FP with Limits and Operator Entry Within Limits
transitions.expression:
('S0120/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0) AND
('^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:INT - with Limits' OR
'^/R_OAR_TYPE.CV' = '_OAR_TYPE_BOI:FP - with Limits') AND
(('^/FAIL_MONITOR/OAR/INPUT.CV'  <=  '^/R_HI_LIMIT.CV') AND
('^/FAIL_MONITOR/OAR/INPUT.CV'  >= '^/R_LO_LIMIT.CV'))

transitions.name: T0000A
transitions.description: Actions Complete and one or more commands = True.  Setup is note complete.
transitions.expression:
('S0000/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0 ) AND 
('TARE.CV' = TRUE OR 
'CANCEL_TARE.CV' = TRUE OR
'RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = TRUE OR
'ZERO.CV' = TRUE OR 
'SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
('^/SETUP_WGT_TYPE/SETUP_COMPLETE.CV' = FALSE)

transitions.name: T0000B
transitions.description: Abort Routine or Error in Command Write
transitions.expression:
('TARE.CV' = FALSE AND 'CANCEL_TARE.CV' = FALSE AND 'RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = FALSE AND 'ZERO.CV' = FALSE AND 'SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = FALSE) OR 
(('S0010/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0 ) AND 
(('^/CMD_ERROR.CV' = TRUE) OR  ('^/POWER_FAIL.CV' = TRUE)) 
AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE))

transitions.name: T0010
transitions.description: Actions Complete and one or more commands = True.  Setup is complete.

('S0000/PENDING_CONFIRMS.CV' = 0 ) AND 
('TARE.CV' = TRUE OR 
'CANCEL_TARE.CV' = TRUE OR 
'RESET_POWER_FLT.CV' = TRUE OR
'ZERO.CV' = TRUE OR 
'SET_TARE_WGT.CV' = TRUE) AND
('^/SETUP_WGT_TYPE/SETUP_COMPLETE.CV' = TRUE)

AND ('^/WRITE_ACTIVE' = FALSE)
